branchCategory.name: 90/91-MXS, Air Slide Table, Cross Roller Guide
branchCategory.description: <p>Air slide table series 90-MXS and 91-MXS series are good for applications that call for precise movement ranging&nbsp; from 10-150mm (1/2-6") typically require a cylinder and a precision guide.&nbsp;&nbsp;90-MXS is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing. 91-MXS includes a "Lub-retainer" and is compatible with low dew point (40&deg;C) applications.&nbsp;The MXS accomplishes this by integrating a cross roller bearing with a guide and&nbsp; two small air cylinders for compact force generation.</p>

breadCrumb.name: 90/91-MXS, Air Slide Table, Cross Roller Guide
